3. 返回导航栏组件的具体文件路径和行号

只做搜索和文件读取，不需要修改任何代码。

    89→
    90→  const mainDom = (
    91→    <main
    92→      {...mainProps}

   145→            ]

   147→          {...headerProps}
   148→        />
   149→      ) : null}
   150→      {mainDom}
   151→      {footerProps !== false && !mainOnly ? (
   152→        <Footer
   153→          {...footerProps}

     2→import { trackComponentName } from '@/coco-react/analytics'
     3→import { MENU_LIST_CONST } from '@/pages/pollo.ai/app/_home/LeftMenuLayout/useMenuList'
     4→import { Trans, useLingui } from '@lingui/react/macro'
     5→
     6→import type { InFlowType } from '@/components/InFlowLink/types'
     7→
     8→export interface MenuItem {
     9→  name: string
    10→  link?: string
    11→  isNofollow?: boolean
    12→  hidden?: boolean
    13→  shouldIndex: boolean // 是否需要自动生成 sortIndex，一般有点击跳转才加，用于上报埋点数据
    14→  sortIndex?: number // 埋点-排序索引
    15→  dataButtonName: string // 埋点-按钮名称
    16→}
    17→export interface MenuListItem extends Omit<MenuItem, 'link'> {
    18→  link: string
    19→  inflow?: InFlowType
    20→}
    21→
    22→export interface IconList extends MenuListItem {
    23→  icon: string
    24→  desc: string
    25→  isBeta?: boolean
    26→}
    27→
    28→export interface HeaderMenu extends MenuItem {
    29→  list?: MenuListItem[]
    30→  className?: string
    31→  wrapperClassName?: string
    32→  templateList?: MenuListItem[]
    33→  videoAiList?: IconList[]
    34→  imageAiList?: IconList[]

    43→    dataButtonName: string // 埋点-按钮名称
    44→    list: {
    45→      name: string
    46→      link: string
    47→      inflow?: InFlowType
    48→      shouldIndex: boolean // 是否需要自动生成 sortIndex，一般有点击跳转才加，用于上报埋点数据
    49→      sortIndex?: number // 埋点-排序索引
    50→      dataButtonName: string // 埋点-按钮名称
    51→    }[]
    52→  }[]
    53→  shouldIndex: boolean // 是否需要自动生成 sortIndex，一般有点击跳转才加，用于上报埋点数据
    54→  sortIndex?: number // 埋点-排序索引
    55→  dataButtonName: string // 埋点-按钮名称
    56→  mobileMenuIcon?: string //移动端菜单图标
    57→  isDarkColor?: boolean // 是否是暗色链接（移动端）
    58→}
    59→
    60→export interface UseHeaderMenuProps {
    61→  isMobile?: boolean
    62→}
    63→
    64→// 自动生成 sortIndex 的工具函数
    65→const generateSortIndex = (items: HeaderMenu[]): void => {
    66→  let currentIndex = 1
    67→  items.forEach((item) => {
    68→    if (item.shouldIndex) {
    69→      item.sortIndex = currentIndex++
    70→    }
    71→    if (item.videoAiList?.length || item.imageAiList?.length) {
    72→      let currentListItemIndex = 1
    73→      const currentList: IconList[] = item.videoAiList ?? item.imageAiList ?? []
    74→      currentList.forEach((currentListItem) => {
    75→        if (currentListItem.shouldIndex) {
    76→          currentListItem.sortIndex = currentListItemIndex++
    77→        }
    78→      })
    79→    } else if (item.groupTab?.length) {
    80→      item.groupTab.forEach((groupTabItem) => {
    81→        let currentListItemIndex = 1
    82→        groupTabItem.list.forEach((listItem) => {
    83→          if (listItem.shouldIndex) {
    84→            listItem.sortIndex = currentListItemIndex++
    85→          }
    86→        })
    87→      })
    88→    }
    89→  })
    90→}
    91→
    92→export function useHeaderMenu(props?: UseHeaderMenuProps) {
    93→  const { isMobile } = props || {}
    94→  const { t } = useLingui()
    95→
    96→  const menuList: HeaderMenu[] = [
    97→    {
    98→      name: t`Home`,
    99→      link: '/',
   100→      shouldIndex: true,
   101→      dataButtonName:
   102→        trackComponentName.navigation.value.index_navigation.value.home.name,
   103→      mobileMenuIcon: 'before:i-cus--pol-home',
   104→      isDarkColor: true,
   105→    },
   106→    {
   107→      name: 'Apps',
   108→      link: '/use-cases',
   109→      shouldIndex: true,
   110→      dataButtonName:
   111→        trackComponentName.navigation.value.index_navigation.value.apps.name,
   112→      mobileMenuIcon: 'before:i-cus--pol-template',
   113→      isDarkColor: true,
   114→    },
   115→    {
   116→      name: t`Explore`,
   117→      link: '/explore',
   118→      hidden: !isMobile,
   119→      isNofollow: true,
   120→      shouldIndex: true,
   121→      dataButtonName:
   122→        trackComponentName.navigation.value.index_navigation.value.explore.name,
   123→      mobileMenuIcon: 'before:i-cus--pol-community',
   124→      isDarkColor: true,
   125→    },
   126→    {
   127→      name: t`Video AI`,
   128→      shouldIndex: true,
   129→      dataButtonName:
   130→        trackComponentName.navigation.value.index_navigation.value.video_ai
   131→          .name,
   132→      mobileMenuIcon: 'before:i-cus--pol-ai-video',
   133→      videoAiList: [
   134→        {
   135→          icon: 'before:i-cus--pol-img-to-video',
   136→          name: t`Image to Video AI`,
   137→          desc: t`Animate a still image into a realistic, dynamic video.`,
   138→          link: '/image-to-video',
   139→          shouldIndex: true,
   140→          dataButtonName:
   141→            trackComponentName.navigation.value.index_navigation.value[
   142→              'video_ai/image_to_video'
   143→            ].name,
   144→          inflow: isMobile
   145→            ? {
   146→                target: MENU_LIST_CONST.IMAGE_TO_VIDEO,
   147→              }
   148→            : undefined,
   149→        },
   150→        {
